recipesJson.name: Diligence dismisseth despondency (Apple Mint Candy)
recipesJson.author: Stoefnick
recipesJson.description:
This is a massive and Refreshing change in the type recipes I usually vape.

I made this for a person that came off of cigarettes recently.

Its a smooth Apple burst on the inhale & exhale with a little boost of Kiwi and coolness all the way.

The mint Candy adds to the sweetness so no need for sweetener.

Give it a go, you might be suprised.

reviews.text: Love this mix! Reminds me so much of Apple Jolly Rancher sticks back in the day!! Mixed it the second time using cap spearmint and EM in place of mint candy - can't get enough...!
